'''Master Stadle''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] who drank at ''[[Prancing Pony|The Prancing Pony]]'' in [[Third Age 2940]]. [[Thorin|Thorin II Oakenshield]] watched as he walked to the bar with a drink and his pipe. He was lifted up to the stool by a [[Men|Man]].

Master Stadle is an original creation for ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''. He is portrayed by [[Kiran Shah]].
